Name: SourceItemReference
Description: A reference to the source object in the source scheme already identified. TypeOfObject dependent on object of comparison.

Name: TargetItemReference
Description: A reference the target object or objects in the target scheme already identified. TypeOfObject dependent on object of comparison. Note that if multiple target items are identified the correspondence between the source and ALL target items must be identical.

Name: Correspondence
Description: Describe the level of similarity and difference between the Source and the Target objects.

Name: RelatedMapReference
Description: Identifies related maps for example an ItemMap of two questions may point to the CodeMap defining the comparison of the two response domains.

Name: Alias
Description: Allows for an alias to be assigned to the correspondence between two items, so that it can be referred to with a single name, that would include both related items.
